verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"On the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> you shall raise <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>
You shall <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in <S%H8033>it,<s%> and you shall <S%H5526>screen<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> with the <S%H6532>veil.<s%>

You shall <S%H935>bring<s%> in the <S%H7979>table,<s%> and set in <S%H6186>order<s%> the things that are on <S%H6187>it.<s%> You shall <S%H935>bring<s%> in the <S%H4501>lampstand,<s%> and <S%H5927>light<s%> its <S%H5216>lamps.<s%>

You shall <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> for <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4539>screen<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%> to the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

"You shall <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4908>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>
You shall <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H3595>basin<s%> between the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> water <S%H4325>therein.<s%>
You shall set <S%H7760>up<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H7760>it,<s%> and hang up the <S%H4539>screen<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court.<s%>

"You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and all that is in <S%H6942>it,<s%> and shall make it holy, and all its <S%H3627>furniture:<s%> and it will be <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

You shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> with all its <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> will be <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>
You shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H3595>basin<s%> and its <S%H3653>base,<s%> and sanctify <S%H6942>it.<s%>

"You shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> them with <S%H4325>water.<s%>

You shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments;<s%> and you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H6942>him,<s%> and sanctify <S%H3547>him,<s%> that he may minister to me in the priest's office.
You shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> coats on <S%H3801>them.<s%>

You shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H4886>them,<s%> as you anointed their <S%H1>father,<s%> that they may minister to me in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office. Their <S%H4888>anointing<s%> shall be to them for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3068>so.<s%> According to all that Yahweh <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H6213>him,<s%> so he did.

It happened in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> on the <S%H7223>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was raised <S%H6965>up.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> raised <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H5414>laid<s%> its <S%H134>sockets,<s%> and set <S%H7760>up<s%> its <S%H7175>boards,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> in its <S%H1280>bars,<s%> and raised <S%H6965>up<s%> its <S%H5982>pillars.<s%>

He spread the <S%H168>covering<s%> <S%H6566>over<s%> the <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4372>roof<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> on <S%H3068>it,<s%> as Yahweh <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

He <S%H3947>took<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> into the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> on the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> on the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

He <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> into the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and set <S%H7760>up<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H4539>screen,<s%> and <S%H5526>screened<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

He <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> on the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H6828>northward,<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H6532>veil.<s%>
He <S%H6187>set<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> on it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

He <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> <S%H5227>opposite<s%> the <S%H7979>table,<s%> on the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H5045>southward.<s%>
He <S%H5927>lit<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
He <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6532>veil;<s%>
and he <S%H6999>burnt<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> of <S%H5561>sweet<s%> spices on <S%H3068>it,<s%> as Yahweh <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
He put <S%H7760>up<s%> the <S%H4539>screen<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%> to the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

He <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4908>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> on it the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

He <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H3595>basin<s%> between the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H7364>therein,<s%> with which to wash.
<S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H7364>washed<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their feet <S%H7272>there.<s%>

When they <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and when they came <S%H7126>near<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> they <S%H7364>washed,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

He raised <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and set <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H4539>screen<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court.<s%> So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%> the <S%H4399>work.<s%>
Then the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3201>wasn't<s%> able to <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> because the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>stayed<s%> on <S%H3068>it,<s%> and Yahweh's <S%H3519>glory<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

When the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was taken <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>from<s%> over the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H5265>onward,<s%> throughout all their <S%H4550>journeys;<s%>
but if the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5927>wasn't<s%> taken up, then they <S%H5265>didn't<s%> travel until the <S%H3117>day<s%> that it was taken <S%H5927>up.<s%>

For the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was on the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> and there was <S%H784>fire<s%> in the cloud by <S%H3915>night,<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> throughout all their <S%H4550>journeys.<s%>
